ResumeMain.Title: My Resume
ResumeMain.Paragraph1: Since you are here, I assume you're an employer or a recruiter. So, let me introduce myself. My name is Dimitrios Charalampidis and I am a financial professional, turned software engineer. I have a strong background in finance and financial derivatives in particular, but I have always been passionate about technology. Have fun exploring my resume!

ResumeAside.Title: Tech Stack
ResumeAside.Paragraph1: Below you can find a list of technologies I love working with.

ResumeTimelineSection.Title: My Professional Timeline
ResumeTimelineSection.Paragraph: Explore my professional journey through a chronological timeline highlighting my key experiences and achievements.
